column4: Microsoft  Getty Images settle dispute over online photo tool
column5: NEW YORK Getty Images has dropped its lawsuit against Microsoft Corp over alleged "massive" copyright infringement  announcing on Tuesday a plan to amicably bring Getty's photos to Microsoft's Internet search engine and devices.

column4: Microsoft  Getty Images settle dispute over online photo tool
column5: NEW YORK  April 7 Getty Images has dropped its lawsuit against Microsoft Corp over alleged "massive" copyright infringement  announcing on Tuesday a plan to amicably bring Getty's photos to Microsoft's Internet search engine and devices.
